item.description:
Loss is something most of us have faced in the journey of life. Herb Pearce is leading a workshop on this very important subject. Here is a description of the event from Herb:

“Meet others going thru loss, divorce, death of a loved one, including pets, sudden change, ending of a relationship or job. Learn ways to manage and cope more successfully with loss.”

After the workshop we might mingle at Herb’s or go to Starbuck’s.

The suggested minimum cost of attending the workshop is $15.00. A sliding scale of any amount is allowed if the cost would otherwise prevent you from coming. The traditional cost of this workshop has been $40.00 so if you can afford more than $15.00, it helps the presenter and those who pay less.

Refreshments will be served. We are also welcomed to bring and share our own food as long as there is not any meat in it.
item.name: Dealing With Loss
